name: Classic Black Patent Leather Purse
description:
Introducing the Classic Black Patent Bag, a blend of elegance and functionality that embodies timeless style and practical design. This stunning purse is crafted from patent leather, offering a chic and sophisticated accessory for any occasion.
Pair it with a summer dress and sandals to complete your look on a relaxed day out, or use it as a power statement for work. Its bold, timeless design amakes it a statement piece that adds elegance and sophistication to any ensemble.
With dimensions of 8 inches in height, 10 inches in length, and 3.9 inches in width, this purse offers ample space for all your essentials. Whether you're heading to the work, running errands, or traveling, the generous size ensures you can carry what you need with ease. The interior includes a zip pocket.
The purse features gold toned accents. The straps are crafted to provide durability ensuring they can withstand daily wear while maintaining their shape and functionality. 
To preserve the beauty and longevity of your tote bag, spot clean with a damp cloth as needed.

name: Embroidered Cream Purse with Gold Detail
description:
Introducing the Embroidered Cream purse with gold detailing. This clutch purse is designed to be your go-to companion for special occasions, offering a timeless appeal with its soft silhouette and shimmering gold accents.
Thequilting adds a luxurious touch, reflecting light and subtly shimmering with every movement. Perfect for day events or evenings out, this clutch effortlessly elevates your ensemble.
Equipped with a chain crossbody strap, this evening bag offers versatility in how you carry it. 
Despite its compact dimensions of 5.5 inches in height, 8.7 inches in length, and 3.2 inches in width, this clutch purse provides ample space for essentials such as your phone, keys, makeup, and more. The polyester lining inside protects your belongings from scratches.
Made from a blend of 80% polyester and 20% cotton, the outer shell of this evening bag is both durable and lightweight.

To preserve the beauty of your evening bag, gently wipe it with a soft cloth as needed. Store it in a dust bag when not in use to protect it.

name: Ratan Basket Shoulder Bag
description:
The Ratan Basket Shoulder Bag is a charming blend of rustic elegance and contemporary style - designed to add a touch of whimsy and sophistication to your ensemble - whether you're strolling through a farmer's market or heading out for brunch with friends.
This shoulder bag features a spacious interior, and contrasting shoulder strap, made from durable ratan, adds a modern twist to the natural straw basket design. The ruched closure at the interior of the bag ensures your belongings stay secure while adding a touch of texture to the overall look.
Made from high-quality materials to ensure durability and style, the upper part of the bag is crafted from 100% cotton, providing a soft and comfortable feel. The main material is 100% straw, giving the bag its distinctive basket weave texture exuding summertime charm. Inside, the bag is lined with 100% cotton.
This bag offers ample space with 18.2 inches in height, 20.5 inches in length, and 5.3 inches in width. The versatile design allows you to carry it comfortably on your shoulder or in your hand. Suitable for various occasions from casual outings to more formal events, pair with a sundress and sandals or jeans and blouse.
Care Instructions - Gently spot clean with a damp cloth as needed. Avoid submerging in water or using harsh chemicals that may damage the natural fibers.

name: Embroidered Leather Bohemian Purse
description:
Introducing the Embroidered Fabric Purse, a delightful blend of artisan craftsmanship and practical elegance. This multi-color bag is designed to be both a stylish accessory and a functional carry-all, perfect for adding a touch of bohemian charm to your everyday ensemble. Pair it with casual denim and a blouse for a relaxed weekend look, or elevate a summer dress with its boho-inspired charm. 
Adorned with intricately embroidered flowers on its exterior, this bag showcases meticulous attention to detail and artisanal flair. The multi-color palette lends versatility, allowing you to pair this tote with a variety of outfits.
With dimensions of 10 inches in height, 11.6 inches in length, and 4.3 inches in width , this tote offers ample space for your essentials without compromising on style. The sturdy polyester outer shell ensures durability, making it suitable for everyday use. Whether you're heading to the market, beach, or a casual outing, this tote bag effortlessly combines functionality with a unique, handcrafted appeal.
Designed for comfort and convenience, the tote features sturdy handles that allow for easy carrying, whether over your shoulder or in your hand. 
Crafted from Leather with 100% Polyester thread and lining, both the outer shell and lining of the bag are durable and easy to maintain. Polyester is known for its resilience and color retention, ensuring that the vibrant embroidery and overall structure of the bag remain intact over time.

name: Black Polka-Dotted Slip Dress
description:
Discover timeless elegance with our Black Polka-Dotted Slip Dress. This chic and playful dress is designed to make a statement, combining classic patterns with a modern silhouette for a look that's both sophisticated and fun.
Featuring a delicate V-neck and spaghetti straps, this dress highlights your shoulders and collarbone, adding a touch of femininity and allure. The A-line silhouette flatters all body types, gracefully skimming over the hips and creating a balanced, elegant look. The playful polka dots add a fun twist to the classic black dress, making it perfect for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to evening events.
Crafted from 100% viscose, this dress offers a silky, smooth texture that feels luxurious against the skin. The fabric drapes beautifully, enhancing the dress's flowy A-line shape and ensuring a comfortable fit throughout the day.
The Black Polka-Dotted Slip Dress is incredibly versatile, easily transitioning from day to night. Pair it with sandals and a sun hat for a chic daytime look, or dress it up with heels and statement jewelry for a sophisticated evening ensemble. Its timeless design ensures it will remain a staple in your wardrobe for years to come.
Machine wash on a delicate cycle at a maximum temperature of 30ºC/86ºF. Iron at a low temperature of up to 110ºC/230ºF if needed, and for professional cleaning, use tetrachloroethylene. Do not tumble dry to maintain the fabric's quality and shape.

name: Satin Effect Midi Skirt in Black
description:
Satin Effect Midi Skirt in Black is high-rise midi skirt is designed to flatter and enhance your silhouette, making it a versatile addition to your collection.
Featuring a high-rise fit and an elastic waistband, this midi skirt ensures both comfort and style. The elastic waistband allows for easy movement throughout the day. The black satin effect adds a touch of luxurious shine, making this skirt perfect for both casual and formal occasions. Its midi length offers a timeless, elegant look that can be dressed up or down.
Crafted from 100% RCS-certified recycled polyester, the use of recycled materials demonstrates a commitment to sustainability without compromising on quality or style. 
In addition to classic black, this skirt is also available in pristine white, offering versatility in styling. The black option exudes elegance and pairs easily with various tops and accessories, while the white version provides a fresh, airy look that's perfect for warmer days or adding a light touch to your outfit.
The Satin Effect Midi Skirt in Black is a must-have for any wardrobe. Pair it with a camisole and heels for a chic office look, or with a casual top and flats for a relaxed yet polished ensemble. Its timeless design and luxurious fabric make it suitable for a wide range of occasions, from work to weekend outings.
Machine wash on a delicate cycle at a max temp of 30ºC/86ºF. Iron at a low temp of up to 110ºC/230ºF. If needed dry cleaning, use tetrachloroethylene. Do not tumble dry.

name: Satin Effect Midi Skirt in Blush Pink
description:
Introducing the Satin Effect Midi Skirt in Blush Pink, a luxurious and versatile piece that blends timeless elegance with sustainable fashion that can be dressed up or down with ease. Designed to elevate any outfit, this high-rise midi skirt features an elastic waistband for a comfortable and flattering fit. 
Pair it with a blouse and heels for a sophisticated office look, or wear it with a casual top and flats for a relaxed yet chic outfit. Its neutral color and elegant design make it a staple piece that complements any wardrobe.
This midi skirt has a high-rise fit that accentuates your waist and an elastic waistband that ensures ease of movement. The satin effect in white creates a smooth, lustrous finish that adds a touch of sophistication to your look. The midi length provides a timeless silhouette.
Made from 100% RCS-certified recycled polyester, this skirt not only looks beautiful but also supports eco-friendly practices. 
In addition to blush pink, this skirt is available in classic black, offering versatility for your wardrobe. The pink option delivers a feminine look that pairs well with a variety of tops and accessories, perfect for creating light and airy ensembles. The black version provides a timeless elegance that's easy to style for any occasion.
Machine wash on a delicate cycle at a max temp of 30ºC/86ºF. Iron at a low temp of up to 110ºC/230ºF. Opt for tetrachloroethylene for dry cleaning. Refrain from tumble drying to maintain the fabric's quality and shape.

name: Flat Strappy Black Sandals with Buckle Embellishment
description:
Introducing the Flat Strappy Black Sandals with Buckel Embellishment, a blend of style and comfort designed to enhance your casual and special occasion attire. These sandals boast a minimalist yet sophisticated design, featuring thin black straps that delicately crisscross over the foot. At the toe, a subtle yet eye-catching metal embellishment adds a touch of elegance and refinement. The black straps create a clean and versatile look, ensuring these sandals pair effortlessly with a range of outfits from jeans and a blouse to summer dresses.
With a sole height of 0.6 inches (1.5 cm), these sandals offer a comfortable fit suitable for prolonged wear. The buckle closure provides a secure, adjustable fit. Whether you're walking through a museum or lounging at a street cafe, these sandals promise stability and ease.
Constructed from durable materials, the straps are made from sturdy and flexible materials that conform comfortably to your feet, ensuring a snug and supportive fit.
Versatility is key with these sandals, as they effortlessly transition from day to night and casual to dressy occasions. Pair them with your favorite summer ensemble for a laid-back look or dress them up with a chic evening outfit. Their classic black color and minimalist design make them a timeless addition to your footwear collection.
To maintain the sandals' quality, gently wipe them clean with a soft cloth as needed. Avoid exposure to harsh chemicals or excessive moisture, which may damage the materials.

name: Bow Trim Heeled Shoes in White
description:
These Heeled Shoes in White with bows are designed to elevate your style with their delicate bow detail, crossed fabric feminine front, and a classic rounded toe, all set atop a comfortable heel.
The bow detail adds a feminine touch, perfectly complementing the front straps that delicately frame the foot. Whether you're dressing up for a wedding, garden party, or a night out, these sandals effortlessly enhance your ensemble with their sophisticated design.
These sandals prioritize comfort without compromising on style. The 2.5-inch heel provides width as well for a a flattering lift while maintaining stability, making them suitable for extended wear. The polyurethane sole ensures durability and flexibility, allowing for ease of movement with every step.
Crafted from high-quality materials, these sandals ensure a soft supple feel against your skin, while also offering durability and provides cushioned support, enhancing comfort throughout the day or evening.
 Pair them with a flowing sundress for a relaxed summer look or wear them with tailored trousers and a blouse for a sophisticated ensemble. Their timeless appeal allows them to transition seamlessly from day to night.
Gently wipe them clean with a soft cloth as needed.

name: Buckled Heeled Shoes
description:
Introducing the Buckled Heeled Shoes in a creamy white, a sophisticated blend of modern elegance and timeless style. These slingback heels are designed to elevate your wardrobe with their chic patent leather finish and intricate buckle detailing, making them a versatile choice for both casual outings and special occasions.
Pair them with a tailored suit for a professional look, or wear them with a cocktail dress for a night out. Their neutral color and elegant design make them a wardrobe essential that transitions seamlessly from day to evening.
Crafted with attention to detail, these slingback heels feature a patent leather finish in a stylish cream hue. The embellished straps at the front add a touch of sophistication and visual interest, while the straight toe silhouette enhances the overall sleek and refined look. A back strap ensures a secure fit, providing comfort and stability with every step.
With a heel height of 2.8 inches (7 cm), these shoes strike the perfect balance between style and comfort. The polyurethane thermoplastic sole offers durability and grip, making them suitable for all-day wear. The cushioned polyurethane insole provides additional comfort, ensuring your feet feel supported throughout the day or night.
Care Instructions - To maintain the beauty and durability of your Buckled Heeled Shoes, wipe them clean with a soft cloth as needed.

name: Closed Toe Pumps in Red
description:
Closed Toe Pumps in Red are a luxurious blend of comfort and style for an accent shoe that adds a sophisticated touch to your footwear collection. 
These heeled shoes feature a closed toe at the front, adding a refined classic design. The bold red color provides contemporary appeal, making them a versatile choice for both casual outings and more formal occasions.
With a sole height of 2.5 inches, these shoes offer a comfortable and low-profile silhouette. The SBS sole provides lightweight cushioning and flexibility, ensuring a steady and supportive stride throughout the day. The open-back design allows for easy slip-on and off, making these mules convenient for daily wear.
Crafted from high-quality fabric. The 100% polyurethane lining adds a smooth and breathable layer, enhancing overall comfort and maintaining a cool interior. The insole, made from 78% polyurethane and 22% polyester, offers additional cushioning for prolonged wear.
The vibrant red hue of these shoes adds a pop of color to any outfit, effortlessly complementing both casual and dressy attire. Pair them with cropped trousers and a blouse for a polished office look, or style them with a sundress for a weekend ensemble. Their timeless design makes them a versatile addition to your footwear collection.
Care -  gently wipe them clean with a soft cloth as needed.

name: Soft Ballet Flats in Blush Pink Leather
description:
Soft Blush Pink Ballet Flats are crafted from soft Italian leather.
Designed for both comfort and style, these ballet flats feature a classic rounded toe and a low-profile sole height of 0.4 inches (1 cm). The leather creates a soft shoe that molds comfortably to your foot.
These flats effortlessly enhance any outfit with their understated yet luxurious appeal.
With a sole crafted from 100% polyurethane thermoplastic, offering lightweight cushioning and flexibility, ensuring all-day comfort. The polyurethane insole provides additional support and cushioning underfoot.
The versatile blush pink color of these ballet flats makes them a wardrobe staple that pairs effortlessly with a wide range of outfits, such as a dress for an evening event, or dress them down with jeans and a blouse for a chic and comfortable everyday look. 
The 100% Italian leather upper ensures a soft and flexible fit, while the polyurethane sole and insole offer stability and support. 
Gently wipe them clean with a soft cloth as needed.

name: Acetate OvalSunglasses in Red
description:
Introducing the Red Acetate Oval Sunglasses, a stylish accessory combining fashion-forward design with superior eye protection - perfect for making a bold statement while ensuring your eyes are safeguarded against the sun's harmful rays.
These sunglasses feature chic oval frames in a striking red hue. The acetate material gives the frames a glossy finish and durable structure, making them both fashionable and long-lasting. The unique oval shape adds a touch of retro glamour. Whether you're heading to the beach, a weekend brunch, or a summer festival, it's the perfect accessory to elevate your look.
Superior Protection with 100% UV protection, shielding your eyes from harmful UVA and UVB rays. With Category 2 lenses, they are ideal for everyday wear, offering moderate protection against sun glare and suitable for various light conditions. The lenses are made from 100% allyl diglycol carbonate, known for its high optical clarity and impact resistance, ensuring clear vision and durability.
Quality Materials - crafted from a blend of 80% cellulose diacetate and 20% copper, combining strength and flexibility, ensuring that the sunglasses maintain their shape while providing a comfortable fit. The allyl diglycol carbonate lenses are lightweight yet sturdy.
The vibrant red frames add a pop of color to any outfit, while the classic oval shape complements a wide range of face shapes. Whether paired with casual wear or a chic summer dress, these sunglasses are sure to enhance your style.

name: Classic Silk Camisole in Black
description:
Elevate your wardrobe with the elegant Camisole in Black. This sophisticated camisole top combines a classic silhouette with a beautiful tuck at the bodice. Pair with a blazer and trousers for a chic office look, or wear it with a skirt and heels for an effortlessly stylish evening outfit. 
This black V-neck camisole features adjustable tied spaghetti straps, allowing you to customize the fit for maximum comfort.  The camisole's sleek silhouette makes it an ideal choice for layering or wearing on its own.
Outer shell is 100% silk, the lining fabric, composed of 100% polyamide, contributes to the camisole's lightweight and breathable nature.
Available in black , this silk camisole offers versatility in styling. The black option exudes sophistication and can easily be paired with anything from denim to formal skirts. 
To maintain the beauty and integrity of your Camisole, hand wash at a maximum temperature of 30ºC/86ºF, and hang to dry. Iron at a low temperature of up to 110ºC/230ºF if needed, 
Keywords: blouse, top, tops, camisole, camisoles

name: Floral Camisole in White
description:
Enhance your wardrobe with the elegant Floral Camisole in White, a versatile piece that seamlessly blends classic charm with modern sophistication. This stunning camisole top is designed to elevate any outfit, making it a must-have addition to your collection. Pair with skirt and heels for an effortlessly stylish evening outfit. Adjustable straps and comfortable fit make it suitable for various body types.
The white V-neck camisole features adjustable tied spaghetti straps, allowing you to customize the fit for ultimate comfort. The tonal textured floral applique detail adds a touch of delicate elegance, enhancing the neckline and creating a romantic, feminine look. 
The outer shell and lining are made from 100% polyester, ensuring a smooth and durable finish. The secondary fabric, composed of 100% polyamide, adds a lightweight and breathable element, enhancing comfort.

Hand wash at a maximum temperature of 30ºC/86ºF. Iron at a low temperature of up to 110ºC/230ºF if needed, and avoid dry cleaning and tumble drying to extend the life of your garment.
Keywords: blouse, top, tops, camisole, camisoles
